title: Mapping Places with the Same Names
intro: There are thousands of cities and towns in the US that share their name with another place. We took a shot at calculating what place someone is referring to, depending on where they are in the US.
details: We carefully crafted an artisanal bouquet of data through an arrangement of proximity and recognition (population and Wikipedia article size). We made a sandbox that explains our method where you can tinker and roll your own.
classic: Check out some hand-picked places we found interesting
locate: Or keep it local and explore nearby places with shared names
